title: The Frightened Lady 1940 (Crime, Mystery film) Directed by George King

sources.title: The Frightened Lady 1940 (Crime, Mystery film) Directed by George King
sources.description:
Lady Lebanon tells her son, William, Lord Lebanon (Marius Goring) that he must marry his cousin Isla Crane to continue the family line. However, William has no intention of marrying Isla and matters are made more complicated due to Isla falling in love with an architect, Richard Ferraby , who has come to Markâ€™s priory to draw up renovation plans. At the same time the strange behavior of two footmen and the family physician add to the mystery surrounding the family. Eventually rumor and speculation lead to a murderous conclusion.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/b1_LSkFSJs8


Original title: The Case of the Frightened Lady (1940) AKA: The Frightened Lady (1940)

Director: George King
Producer: S. W. Smith
Writer: Edgar Wallace, Edward Dryhurst, Robert Stevenson
Genre: Classics, Crime, Drama, Mystery
Main Cast:
Marius Goring
Penelope Dudley-Ward
Helen Haye
Felix Aylmer
George Merritt
Ronald Shiner
Patrick Barr
